article_html: The mother of one of the Texas gunmen who were shot dead on Sunday after opening fire at an exhibition of caricatures of the Prophet Muhammad says her son was not a violent person. Sharon Soofi says she is thankful her son Nadir Soofi did not kill anyone in the attack. Police say Soofi and Elton Simpson were shot dead at the heavily-guarded event in Garland, Texas
text: The mother of one of the Texas gunmen who were shot dead on Sunday after opening fire at an exhibition of caricatures of the Prophet Muhammad says her son was not a violent person. Sharon Soofi says she is thankful her son Nadir Soofi did not kill anyone in the attack. Police say Soofi and Elton Simpson were shot dead at the heavily-guarded event in Garland, Texas
title: Texas gunman was 'not a violent person', says mother – video
